oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-01-30 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from January 30, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Roy Acuff (host/performer) with his Smoky Mountain Boys (including Howdy Forrester, June Webb, Bashful Brother Oswald, and Jimmy Riddle), guest performer Billy Walker, and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, and June Carter. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1060th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: June Carter; Archie Campbell; Don Gibson; Billy Walker; Bashful Brother Oswald; Roy Acuff; Smoky Mountain Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces June Carter -- Comedy routine (June Carter, Archie Campbell) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Don Gibson) (recording) -- Grant Turner introduces Billy Walker -- Changed My Mind (Billy Walker) -- Grant Turner introduces Bashful Brother Oswald -- Columbus Stockade Blues (Bashful Brother Oswald) -- Grant Turner and Roy Acuff talk about his Caribbean tour -- Don't Know Why (Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Roy Acuff) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Network announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Jackson, Tommy; Campbell, Archie; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Acuff, Roy; Smoky Mountain Boys; Bashful Brother Oswald; Webb, June, 1934-; Forrester, Howdy, 1922-1987; Riddle, Jimmy, 1918-1982; Walker, Billy, 1929-2006; Gibson, Don (Donald Eugene), 1928-2003
